hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Salama:`Aisha's brother and I went to `Aisha and he asked her about the bath of the Prophet. She brought a pot containing about a Sa` of water and took a bath and poured it over her head and at that time there was a screen between her and us

chapter.eng-name: Taking a bath with a Sa' of water or so (One Sa' = 3 kilograms approx.)
